findings.quote: based on empirical studies of lottery winners and inheritance recipients.
findings.issue: Missing context about why lottery/inheritance studies relate to UBI effects
Ambiguous wording - unclear if "negative" means reduction or value below zero

findings.quote: which may not perfectly translate to UBI
findings.issue: Vague statement without explaining key differences between lottery/inheritance and UBI
Economic jargon without explanation for general audience

findings.quote: Geographic variations in cost of living would affect impact
findings.issue: Unclear how cost of living affects labor supply impact
